fields.text: Thank you for calling Genomic Health Peninsula, where we transform cancer treatment decisions with clinically actionable diagnostics.
For information about our genomic diagnostic tests and patient support services, press '[INDEX]'.
To order a test kit or schedule specimen collection, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a patient services representative.
To inquire about test results or patient support resources, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our patient support team.
For healthcare professional services and research partnerships, press '[INDEX]'.
To place clinician orders and access clinical guidelines, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our clinician support team.
For research partnerships and trial collaborations, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our research collaborations department.
